import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; function Home() { return (

Welcome to EduRPG

Learn while you play! Embark on an educational adventure.

Get Started Login

Game Features

Educational Combat

Answer questions to defeat enemies and level up your knowledge

Study Guilds

Join guilds with friends to tackle challenging quests together

Skill Trees

Customize your learning path with specialized skill trees

About EduRPG

EduRPG is a cross-platform educational role-playing game designed to make learning fun and engaging. Available on terminal, web, and mobile platforms, EduRPG combines the excitement of RPG gameplay with educational content to help you master new skills and knowledge.

); } export default Home;
